temples.name: Laie Hawaii Temple
temples.address: 55-600 Naniloa Loop, Laie HI, 96762-2202, United States
temples.closure: Friday, 4 October 2019, (Limited Hours), Saturday, 5 October 2019, Wednesday, 27 November 2019, (Limited Hours), Thursday, 28 November 2019, Tuesday, 24 December 2019, Wednesday, 25 December 2019, Friday, 27 December 2019, Saturday, 28 December 2019, Monday, 30 December 2019
temples.history: Dedicated November 1919, by Heber J. Grant, Rededication 21 November 2010, by Thomas S. Monson
temples.summary: The Laie Hawaii Temple was both the first temple built in Polynesia (Hawaii) and the first temple dedicated outside of the state of Utah.

temples.name: Kona Hawaii Temple
temples.address: 75-230 Kalani St, Kailua-Kona HI, 96740-1833, United States
temples.closure: Monday, 23 September 2019 - Monday, 7 October 2019, Thursday, 28 November 2019, Tuesday, 24 December 2019, Wednesday, 25 December 2019, Tuesday, 31 December 2019
temples.history: Dedication, January 2000, by Gordon B. Hinckley
temples.summary: Kona Hawaii Temple is 6th temple built in Polynesia, and the second temple built in Hawaii.

temples.name: San Diego California Temple
temples.address: 7474 Charmant Dr, San Diego, California, 92122-5000, United States
temples.closure: Monday, 30 September 2019 - Monday, 11 November 2019, Wednesday, 27 November 2019, Thursday, 28 November 2019, Tuesday, 24 December 2019, Wednesday, 25 December 2019, Tuesday, 31 December 2019
temples.history: Dedication, April 1993, by Gordon B. Hinckley
temples.summary: The San Diego Temple was the third temple built in California. Over 720,000 visitors attended the open house.

temples.name: St. George Utah Temple
temples.address: 250 East 400 South, St. George, Utah, 84770-3699, United States
temples.services: Clothing rental, Cafeteria, Patron housing, Distribution center
temples.closure: Monday, 2 September 2019, Monday, 9 September 2019 - Saturday, 21 September 2019, Saturday, 5 October 2019, Monday, 4 November 2019 - Friday, 4 November 2022
temples.history: Dedication, 1 January 1877, Wilford Woodruff, Rededication, November 1975, Spencer W. Kimball
temples.summary: The St. George temple is the longest operating temple in the Church history, and the first built in Utah.
